song.title: Heart of Worship
song.lyrics:
[1] .D A When the music fades . Em And all is stripped away . A7sus4 And I simply come || .D A Longing just to bring, . Em Something that's of worth . A7sus4 That will bless your heart
[p] .Em D/F# A I'll bring You more than a song . Em For a song in itself . D/F# A Is not what You have required || .Em D/F# A You search much deeper within . Em Through the way things appear . D/F# A You're looking into my heart
[C] .D A2/C# I'm coming back to the heart of worship . Em D/F# G A D And it's all about You, its all about You, Jesus || . A2/C# I'm sorry Lord for the things I've made it . Em D/F# G A D When it's all about You, all about You, Jesus --- [2] .D A King of endless worth, . Em No one could express . A7sus4 How much You deserve || .D A Though I'm weak and poor . Em All I have is Yours . A7sus4 Every single breath
song.presentation: 1 P C 2 P C P C
